<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085924</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Alternative discussion formats: the talk show</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Alternative Diskussion Formate: das 
Gespräch Erscheinen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Formats alternatifs de discussion : 
l'exposition d'entretien</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Formatos alternativos da discussão: a 
mostra da conversa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Formati alternativi di discussione: 
l'esposizione di colloquio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εναλλακτικές μορφές συζήτησης: η συζήτηση 
εμφανίζει</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Formatos alternativos de la discusión: la 
demostración de la charla</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The talk show is a format with which students are already familiar, and it provides the structure for a great discussion.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Gespräch Erscheinen ist ein Format, mit dem 
Kursteilnehmer bereits vertraut sind, und es stellt die Struktur für 
eine große Diskussion zur Verfügung.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'exposition d'entretien est un format dont les 
étudiants sont déjà au courant, et il fournit la structure pour une
grande discussion.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A mostra da conversa é um formato com que os 
estudantes são já familiares, e fornece a estrutura para uma 
discussão grande.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'esposizione di colloquio è un formato con cui 
gli allievi hanno già familiarità e fornisce la struttura per una 
discussione grande.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η συζήτηση εμφανίζει ότι είναι μια μορφή με την 
οποία οι σπουδαστές εξοικειώνονται ήδη, και παρέχει τη δομή για 
μια μεγάλη συζήτηση.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La demostración de la charla es un formato con el
cual los estudiantes son ya familiares, y proporciona a la estructura 
para una gran discusión.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD

END:VCARD</entity>

        </lifeCycle>

          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>

              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>

    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
